name: Rip & Tea
description:
Sarah loves tea more than anything in the world and is very happy to join the largest tea company in the world! But things doesn't turn out the way she was hoping for...

---

A very short interactive story-ish game, made for the Trijam #156 with the theme "tea time". Also, my first submission to a game jam ever. Development took much longer than expected and was way over the intended 3 hours of the Trijam. Still, was a lot of fun.

The current version can be considered an alpha/prototype. I do plan to release a polished version of this game later. In particular, I want to add some music/sound effects, update some character sprites, and also, add a proper finale for the story.

The game is made in WOLF RPG Editor. As such, the typical controls of the editor apply, i.e.:
Movement: Arrow keys
Confirm: Space / Enter
Cancel / Open Menu: Esc
Toggle Fullscreen: F11
Toggle window size in windowed mode: F4

Content warning: Violence, murder (it's really nothing extreme though. The game uses pixel graphics anyway.)

Credits: This game uses tileset assets from https://limezu.itch.io/
